Sound - Class in client
This class acts to handle all storage and retrieval of information relating to the functioning sound loop.
Sound() - Constructor for class client.Sound
Constructor that will create a new Sound Object and set all values to their defaults.
sound - Variable in class userInterface.LauncherUI
The instantiated Sound Object that acts for all sound manipulation/detection actions
soundLoop - Variable in class userInterface.LauncherUI
Thread that will continually run the dispatcher when requested.
soundRun - Variable in class client.Sound
Serves as an int toggle relating to whether or notthe sound loop should be running at a given moment.
soundRun - Variable in class userInterface.LauncherUI
A boolean int that serves to tell whether or not the full sound detection loop should execute at a given time
start(Stage) - Method in class userInterface.LauncherUI
Standard javafx start method that will begin loading and executing the user interface level of the application
stringStatus1 - Variable in class client.Sound
Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the first string that the user tests.
stringStatus2 - Variable in class client.Sound
Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the second string that the user tests.

Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the third string that the user tests.
